title: Scarlett Moffatt sobs over sick letter from troll calling her fat with 'pork-chop' mouth
text:

Scarlett Moffatt has given her social media followers a glimpse of a nasty letter, that left her in tears, which was sent to her home address by a troll on Tuesday morning.

The Googlebox star, 29, received a mean hand-written note in the post that called her "fat" with a "mouth that looks like a pork chop cut in half."

Blasting the horrible author, Scarlett took to her Instagram stories to share her surprise at being sent a letter in the post and to admit that she was left upset by the words as she sobbed. - after initially putting on brave face.

She began: "So I was going to pretend I was not bothered but I think it is important that I show I am."

The star then began tearing up as she reflected on a tough few weeks.

Scarlett added "It has bothered us quiet a bit as I think wow you feel that strongly about how I look that you have sat down and wrote a letter.

"The reason I am doing this video is so that you can see you need to be kinder. You don’t know whats going on in someones life.

(Image: Instagram)

"I am just a person, I am someones daughters, someones girlfriend, someones sister I have feelings and everything.

"I feel like on Instagram people think we are not real life people but we are and we have feelings."

Thanking her supporters, she added: "I have been inundated with lovely messages and I can’t thank you enough because I needed them. I am going to spend the day doing what I love which is spending time my boyfriend, eating carbs and watching fun stuff on the tv.

(Image: Instagram)

"I need you all to be kinder. Lets make a pledge to be kinder. If you have nothing nice to say just keep it in your mind and don’t voice it."

She ended the clip: "I think the world would be much kinder if that was the case, so be kind is my message today."

It came after earlier on in the day she shared pyjama-clad footage, where she put on a brave face about the horrible letter.

Acting unbothered, she shared: "Can I just say I did not know this was a thing, I know trolls is a thing but I just received a letter in the post.

(Image: Instagram)

"Lets have a look, If anyone recognise this handwriting its from an a**hole.

"It is s****ing off google box which I haven’t been in for three years - unless its got stuck in the post."

She then joked: "The post can’t take that long."

Summarising what was written, the Geordie told: " Erm just calling us fat really and apparently my mouth looks like a pork chop sliced in half."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Before adding: "What else have they done they’ve put a clip in from the paper.

"Thanks for that! Much love!."

It was followed by a partial snap of the letter before Scarlett added another clip, where she said: "Also to whoever sent that letter to me and said I speak wrong, you have spelt surprise wrong, before spelling it out correctly."

The former I'm A Celebrity star also took to her grid to upload the picture of the note where she told her followers that she will not let bullies "get her down" and urged people to "be kind."

(Image: Instagram)

She wrote: "The fact someone’s sent me a letter as they feel so strongly about my weight is ridiculous. Turns out I'm not even safe from vile comments in the comfort of my own home.

"I WILL NOT let bullies like this get me down. I just wish they’d left me a reply address and I would have sent them some local charity details and clubs near them so they could occupy there time as they seem to have so much of it by helping others.

"Let’s just be kind to people as we don’t know what’s going on in their lives #bekind."

Scarlett rose to fame on Channel 4's Googlebox with her parents and then became a household name after a string of presenting roles including appearing on Ant and Dec's Saturday Night Takeaway and I'm A Celebrity: Extra Camp.
description: The TV personality has shared that she has been sent a nasty handwritten letter from a troll
